Text: This is the STUPIDEST documentary I ever wasted my time watching. Avoid this one guys, this has nothing to do with civilization coming to an end, or society crumbling under the weight of corruption or anything like that. IT'S ABOUT PEOPLE IN OTHER COUNTRIES WEARING AMERICAN DENIM JEANS. This is the most worthless documentary I ever seen and I'm a little angry that such a stupid documentary was even created in the first place.

Mate you must have the attention span of a goldfish.. this is very good stuff and explains very simply how civilizations rise and fall.. and the West is next.

You're not American, are you?!

Great series, very informative. Ignore the first posters ignorant rant, if you like informative documentaries then you will not be sorry you downloaded it.
Thanks to the team for the upload.
